CustomField.description: Only used by the new Customizable Rollups engine in LDV Orgs and only when required for LDV orgs
CustomField.inlineHelpText: FOR LDV ORGS ONLY WITH SFDO GUIDANCE. To avoid a Query Timeout in the rollup batch job in orgs with many millions of Contacts, this specifies the maximum number of Contacts processed in each batch.
CustomField.label: LDV: Contact Hard Credit Chunk Size
